mbio.ncct.ont.util

Class CheckUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • mbio.ncct.ont.util.CheckUtil

  • public class CheckUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the pipeline utilities with check functions.
    Author:
    Yan Zhou created on 2019/06/18

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Boolean checkAtLeastOneModuleIsSelected(BaseCallingModel bcm, DemultiplexingModel dm, ReadsFilterModel rfm, AssemblyModel am, PolishingModel pm)
      Checks if at least one module of pipeline is selected.
      java.lang.Boolean checkBaseCallingWithFast5(BaseCallingModel bcm, GeneralModel gm)
      Checks if base calling with FAST5 files.
      java.lang.Boolean checkDeviceWithCorrectFlowcellInFasfMode(BaseCallingModel bcm)
      Checks if device with the correct flowcell ID when guppy_basecaller fast mode is used.
      Correct combinations:
      "PromethION" with "FLO-PRO", "MinION/GridION/MinIT" with "FLO-MIN"
      java.lang.Boolean checkDirectoryValidity(java.io.File selectedDirectory, java.lang.String extension)
      Checks if the directory has the correct files with the given extension.
      java.lang.Boolean checkHybridAssemblyWithIlluminaReads(AssemblyModel am, GeneralModel gm)
      Checks if hybrid assembly with Illumina reads.
      java.lang.Boolean checkIlluminaReads(java.io.File illuminaDirectory)
      Checks the Illumina reads directory.
      Illumina reads name structure example:
      ID40_HQ_1.fastq.gz ID40_HQ_2.fastq.gz
      java.lang.Boolean checkOntDirIsNotEmpty(GeneralModel gm)
      Checks if the ONT directory is empty.
      java.lang.Boolean checkOntReadsPrefix(java.io.File ontDirectory, java.io.File illuminaDirectory)
      Checks if the prefixes ONT reads are unique and if the set of Illumina prefixes contains all ONT reads prefixes.
      java.lang.Boolean checkOutDirIsNotEmpty(GeneralModel gm)
      Checks if the output directory is empty.
      java.lang.Boolean checkPolishingWithIlluminaReads(PolishingModel pm, GeneralModel gm)
      Checks if polishing with Illumina reads.
      java.lang.Boolean CheckPrefixIfOntFastqWithHybridAssemblyOrPolishing(GeneralModel gm, AssemblyModel am, PolishingModel pm)
      Checks if the prefixes are correct when the format of ONT read is FASTQ and assembly or/and polishing module(s) is/are selected.
      java.lang.Boolean checkSampleSheet(java.lang.String sampleSheet, java.lang.String extension)
      Checks if the sample sheet has the correct content.
      Sample sheet example see:
      https://ontpipeline2.readthedocs.io/en/latest/InputFileStructure.html#sample-sheet
      java.lang.Boolean checkSelectedBarcodesFormat(GeneralModel gm)
      Checks if the format of the selected barcodes is correct.
      java.lang.Boolean checkThreadsFormat(GeneralModel gm)
      Checks if the format of threads is correct.

        public java.lang.Boolean checkDeviceWithCorrectFlowcellInFasfMode(BaseCallingModel bcm)

        Checks if the prefixes are correct when the format of ONT read is FASTQ and assembly or/and polishing module(s) is/are selected.

        am - An AssemblyModel object.
        pm - A PolishingModel object.
        Returns:

                                                java.lang.String extension)
        Checks if the directory has the correct files with the given extension.
        Parameters:
        selectedDirectory - the given directory to be checked.
        extension - the given extension to be checked in the directory
        Returns:
        the Boolean value if the directory is valid.

      • checkOntReadsPrefix

        public java.lang.Boolean checkOntReadsPrefix(java.io.File ontDirectory,
                                             java.io.File illuminaDirectory)
        Checks if the prefixes ONT reads are unique and if the set of Illumina prefixes contains all ONT reads prefixes.
        Parameters:
        ontDirectory - the path of ONT reads directory.
        illuminaDirectory - the path of Illumina reads directory.
        Returns:
        true if all prefixes ONT reads are unique and the set of Illumina prefixes contains all ONT reads prefixes.

      • checkIlluminaReads

        public java.lang.Boolean checkIlluminaReads(java.io.File illuminaDirectory)
        Checks the Illumina reads directory.

        Parameters:
        illuminaDirectory - the path to the Illumina reads directory.
        Returns:
        the Boolean value if the Illumina reads directory is valid.
